where functionary.functionary_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or adminagency.adminagency_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where functionary.functionary_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT functionary.functionary_id as functionaryId ,functionary.adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,adminagency.adminagency_name as adminagencyName ,functionary.functionary_num as functionaryNum ,functionary.functionary_pw as functionaryPw ,functionary.functionary_name as functionaryName ,functionary.functionary_phone as functionaryPhone ,functionary.functionary_email as functionaryEmail ,functionary.functionary_date_join as functionaryDateJoin FROM functionary inner join adminagency using(adminagency_code)
where functionary.functionary_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or adminagency.adminagency_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where functionary.functionary_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where adminagency.adminagency_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY functionary_date_join DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT functionary_id as functionaryId ,adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,functionary_num as functionaryNum ,functionary_pw as functionaryPw ,functionary_name as functionaryName ,functionary_phone as functionaryPhone ,functionary_email as functionaryEmail ,functionary_date_join as functionaryDateJoin FROM functionary where functionary_id = #{functionaryId}
SELECT functionary_move_inout_code as functionaryMoveInoutCode FROM functionary_move_inout where functionary_id = #{functionaryId} ORDER BY functionary_date_move_in desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE functionary_move_inout SET functionary_date_move_out = now() ,functionary_state_work = '전출' WHERE functionary_move_inout_code = #{functionaryMoveInoutCode}
mapper.select: SELECT adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,adminagency_name as adminagencyName FROM adminagency where adminagency_name like CONCAT('%', #{checkAdminagency}, '%')

SELECT goodsfacility.goodsfacility_code as goodsfacilityCode ,goodsfacility.goodsfacility_name as goodsfacilityName ,goodsfacility.adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,adminagency.adminagency_name as adminagencyName ,goodsfacility.goodsfacility_date_registration as goodsfacilityDateRegistration from goodsfacility inner join adminagency using(adminagency_code) where functionary_id = #{functionaryId}

SELECT rgi.return_goodsfacility_info_code as returnGoodsfacilityInfoCode ,rgi.goodsfacility_code as goodsfacilityCode ,rgi.classify_goodsfacility as classifyGoodsfacility ,rgi.citizen_id as citizenId ,ci.citizen_name as citizenName ,rgi.is_requested_to_return_as_delivery as isRequestedToReturnAsDelivery ,rgi.overdue_days as overdueDays ,rgi.adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,ad.adminagency_name as adminagencyName ,rgi.state_goods_code as stateGoodsCode ,rgi.date_return_check as dateReturnCheck from return_goodsfacility_info as rgi inner join adminagency as ad using(adminagency_code) inner join citizen as ci using(citizen_id) where functionary_id = #{functionaryId}

SELECT united_afterservice_request.united_afterservice_request_code as unitedAfterserviceRequestCode ,(case when 0 = united_afterservice_request.return_goodsfacility_info_code then '정기점검' when united_afterservice_request.return_goodsfacility_info_code > 0 then '반납' else '에러' end) as requestType ,united_afterservice_request.adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,adminagency.adminagency_name as adminagencyName ,united_afterservice_request.goodsfacility_code as goodsfacilityCode ,united_afterservice_request.goodsfacility_name as goodsfacilityName ,united_afterservice_request.state_goods_code as stateGoodsCode ,united_afterservice_request.text_check_result_goodsfacility as textCheckResultGoodsfacility ,united_afterservice_request.agency_code as agencyCode ,united_afterservice_request.agency_name as agencyName ,united_afterservice_request.date_request_afterservice as dateRequestAfterservice ,united_afterservice_request.date_complete_afterservice as dateCompleteAfterservice from united_afterservice_request inner join adminagency using(adminagency_code) where functionary_id = #{functionaryId}

SELECT agency.agency_code as agencyCode ,agency.adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,adminagency.adminagency_name as adminagencyName ,agency.functionary_name as functionaryName ,functionary.functionary_id as functionaryId ,agency.agency_name as agencyName ,agency.agency_businesstype_code as agencyBusinesstypeCode ,agency.agency_date_registration as agencyDateRegistration ,agency.agency_date_contract_closed as agencyDateContractClosed from functionary inner join agency using(functionary_name) inner join adminagency on agency.adminagency_code = adminagency.adminagency_code where functionary.functionary_id = #{functionaryId}

SELECT annualfee_pakage_code as annualfeePakageCode ,annualfee_pakage_name as annualfeePakageName ,annualfee_pakage_price as annualfeePakagePrice ,annualfee_pakage_text_sangse as annualfeePakageTextSangse ,annualfee_pakage_discount_rate as annualfeePakageDiscountRate ,adminagency_code as adminagencyCode ,annualfee_pakage_date_registration as annualfeePakageDateRegistration from annualfee_pakage inner join annualfee_pakage_authority using(annualfee_pakage_code) where functionary_id = #{functionaryId}
